column4: any obvious reason why cron for root would not work on 10.04?
how are you coming to that conclusion?
you're typing that in a terminal or what...
how comes it needs full path for echo, never saw that one before
can I just set it in cron directly?
when you say "in cron job", it doesn't tell me what you are doing.  But it doesn't matter, you figured it out
now that I've set path echo `date` > /root/cron.log work
